item.description:
Dunn's Pub will be hosting a fundraiser for the Hospital of St. Raphael's "Sister to sister" program, which provides support and financial assistance to women who have been diagnosed with breast cancer but do not have health insurance. (I double-checked, and men are also invited and encouraged to attend. ) There will be a $5.00 donation at the door to benefit the porgram. More event information is pasted below from the group's flyer. Hope to see you there!
-Neil
203-645-2008

"Cocktails for the Clinic"


Please come for Happy Hour on
Tuesday, October 20th, anytime 5 - 8 pm
at Dunn's Pub ~ 2345 Whitney Ave, Hamden
$5.00 donation at the door to benefit the Hospital
of St. Raphael's "Sister to Sister" program

Dunn’s Pub is located near the center of Hamden next to Joiya Day Spa. Parking is behind the pub and can be accessed from Whitney Ave. at the one way sign next to the Hamden Center sign. From Dixwell Ave., the parking lot can be accessed next to Kindercare at the Hamden Center sign. Park in the lot for easy access to the alley leading to Dunn’s. Additional parking is available in the free municipal lot behind Brownstone Restaurant and next to TD Banknorth near the corner of Whitney Ave. and Dixwell Ave.



Imagine yourself or someone you love diagnosed with cancer and without health insurance...the cost can be catastrophic. The Sister-to-Sister program provides cancer care to those in need.


Have a drink, listen to some music, mingle with friends, and help support the cause.....

Your hosts for the evening: The Pink Ladies breast cancer support group and patients of Dr. Andrea Silber
item.name: "Cocktails for the clinic" - a fundraiser to support breast cancer patients
